item.description:
Whether you're already a Free State Project participant, simply considering it, or want to have a good time with fellow pro-liberty activists, PorcFest is the place to be this summer! This four day event is intended to showcase New Hampshire and the Free State Project community in a relaxed, social, and fun atmosphere.

Meet, Mingle, Move!

Book your campsite at Roger's Campsite and Motel, or call them and leave a message at 603-788-4885 and they will be in touch. Be sure to mention PorcFest for your 10% discount! (Please note, in order for the discount to be processed, if you book online, you will receive a cancellation email followed by a confirmation email. Sorry for any confusion, but it is the only way for Roger's to apply the discount.)
2010 Porcupine Freedom Festival Schedule
June 24-27, 2010
Roger's Campground and Motel, Lancaster, New Hampshire

details here:
http://porcfest10.eve...
item.name: Porcfest
